title: What printer?
content:
Hi Everyone,

I found a few threads on this, but they seemed to be several years old and I’d guess that options have changed at least a bit since then; I’m looking to buy a printer with postscript, at least A3+ (or borderless A3 if that exists in lasers) and colour. It would also be a bonus if it could take heavier papers too.

On a budget :)

Any suggestions? Tips on what to look out for?

Thanks heaps!

-Rafe

 [‹ Better than @font-face: an open internet font service](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201172622/http:/typophile.com/node/46264 "Go to previous forum topic") [Hilarious font satire from SomthingAwful.com ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201172622/http:/typophile.com/node/46305 "Go to next forum topic")
author: rafe.copeland@g...
